message_list.content: Hi and welcome to Celestar Air. I’m Nova, your virtual flight assistant. Thanks for calling! How can I help you today?
Hi Nova! I just wanted to check some details about a flight I’m looking at, if that’s okay?
Absolutely—happy to help. What’s the route and date you’re considering? If you have a preferred cabin (Economy, Premium Economy, or Aether Business), let me know as well.
Sure! I'm looking at a one-way flight from Dallas-Fort Worth to San Francisco on December 13th, 2025, in Economy class.
Great, I can check options for Dallas–Fort Worth to San Francisco on December 13, 2025 in Economy. Do you prefer nonstop or are connections okay? Also, about what time of day works best for you?
I’d prefer a nonstop flight, and sometime around early afternoon would be ideal.

Thanks! Nonstop in the early afternoon—got it. This may take a moment; thanks for your patience. I’m pulling up our Dallas–Fort Worth to San Francisco schedules for December 13, 2025. Do you have flexibility by plus/minus one hour around early afternoon, or is a departure window like 12:00–15:00 perfect?
Yeah, I’m fine with a little flexibility, plus or minus an hour works for me.

Perfect, thanks. With a ±1 hour around early afternoon, here’s what we typically offer on that route:
- Nonstop window roughly 12:00–15:00, with departures around 12:45–14:30 and flight time about 3.5 hours.
- Economy includes one personal item; standard carry-on is allowed, and first checked bag has a fee unless you’re Stratos Rewards Gold or above.

Would you like me to hold seats on the earliest nonstop in that window (targeting ~12:45), or see fares for a couple of options first? If you have a price target, share that and I’ll focus on the best-value fare family.
Oh, I don’t need to book anything just yet, I’m just trying to get a better idea of the flight details for now.

No problem at all—here’s a clear picture of what to expect for Dallas–Fort Worth to San Francisco on Saturday, December 13, 2025, in Economy, early‑afternoon nonstop:

- Typical schedule: One to two nonstops in the 12:30–14:30 range; block time about 3h 35m.
- Aircraft: Commonly an Airbus A321 or Boeing 737‑class narrow‑body with power at seat and Wi‑Fi.
- Onboard: Complimentary soft drinks; buy‑on‑board snacks. Seat pitch ~31–32″ in standard Economy; extra‑legroom seats available for a fee.
- Baggage: One personal item and one standard carry‑on included; first checked bag fee applies unless Stratos Rewards Gold+ or eligible fare.
- Seat selection: Standard seats available at booking; extra‑legroom and preferred rows priced dynamically.
- Change/cancel: Economy fares vary—Value fares are more restrictive, Flex fares allow changes with reduced or no fee (fare difference may apply).
- Earning: Stratos Rewards miles on all eligible fares; higher accrual for Flex or bundled options.

If you’d like, I can pull live schedules and sample fares for that window to give you exact flight numbers and prices—should I go ahead and check the earliest nonstop around 12:45 and one alternative near 14:00?
No, that’s alright, Nova. This info is super helpful already, thank you!
You’re very welcome! If anything changes or you want live schedules and fares, just ask and I’ll pull them up. Have a great day and safe travels ahead.
